name: DemonBeltsPipesInserters
title: Demon Belts, Pipes and Inserters
author: AeonDX
description:
Changes the vanilla Belts, Inserters and Pipes for the needs of the Demon-Server.

  Belt speeds: 30/60/120.
  Inserter speed changes to accommodate for the new belt speeds.
  Underground belts and pipes max distance: 20.
